biotools.summary: ChemFate predicts daily chemical environmental concentrations for four classes of chemicals in nine environmental compartments (e.g., air, freshwater, coastal seawater, natural soil, urban soil, agricultural soil with and without applied biosolids). ChemFate comprises four different models:.
